item.title: 意大利 Ferrovie 公司首席执行官表示对外国投资者持开放态度
item.description: 意大利国有铁路运营商向包括私募股权公司在内的外国投资者敞开大门，首席执行官斯特凡诺-多纳鲁马（Stefano Donnarumma）正在为子公司寻求资金，以推动其发展和现代化计划。【原文：Italy’s state rail operator is open to foreign investors including private equity firms as Chief Executive Officer Stefano Donnarumma seeks capital for subsidiaries to fuel his growth and modernization plans.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心指数连续第五个月上升
item.description: 美国消费者情绪在 12 月份连续第五个月上升，对通胀的看法也趋于乐观。【原文：US consumer sentiment rose for a fifth month in December and views on inflation edged up.】

item.title: 法国准备将 1999 年以来的首个新核电机组接入电网
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）将在四分之一世纪以来首次将一座新的核反应堆接入法国电网，在经济萎靡不振导致需求低迷之际增加低碳电力供应。【原文：Electricite de France SA is set to connect a new nuclear reactor to the French power grid for the first time in a quarter century, adding low-carbon electricity supply at a time when a sputtering economy has made demand sluggish.】

item.title: 壳牌向普拉克斯出售德国施韦德炼油厂股权失败
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）之前同意出售其在施韦德特炼油厂（Schwedt refinery）的股份，但该厂为德国东部大部分地区供应燃料，目前该协议已告吹。【原文：Shell Plc’s previously agreed sale of its stake in the Schwedt refinery, a plant that supplies much of eastern Germany with fuel, has fallen through.】

item.title: Grover 债权人警告德国初创企业下周有违约风险
item.description: Grover 的主要债权人之一警告说，如果股东阻挠其重组计划，它可能最快在下周撤回紧急资金，从而使这家陷入困境的德国初创企业陷入违约。【原文：One of Grover’s main creditors warned it could withdraw emergency funding as soon as next week, sending the troubled German startup into default, if shareholders obstruct its restructuring plan.】

item.title: AT&T 希望向固话持有者推销新型家庭电话
item.description: AT&T 公司希望说服全国各地的人们在 2029 年底之前放弃固定电话。为此，AT&T 公司正在部署一种新武器：无线家用电话。【原文：AT&T Inc. hopes to persuade people across the country to break up with their landlines by the end of 2029. To do so, it’s deploying a new weapon that might help: a wireless home phone.】

item.title: 无人机飞行禁令扩展至纽约重要基础设施
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局禁止无人机在纽约关键基础设施上空飞行，为期一个月。【原文：The US Federal Aviation Administration imposed a month-long ban on drones flying over critical infrastructure in New York, a day after announcing the same measure for New Jersey.】

item.title: 富国银行称将退出气候银行集团
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）表示将退出全球最大的银行气候联盟，这是华尔街正在脱离此类组织的最新迹象。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. said it’s leaving the world’s biggest climate alliance for banks, in the latest sign that Wall Street is breaking away from such groups.】

item.title: 美联储关键通胀数据低于预期，国债上涨
item.description: 在一批备受关注的通胀数据低于预期后，美国国债上涨，导致交易员对美联储明年降息的前景有所乐观。【原文：US Treasuries gained after a closely watched batch of inflation data came in below expectations, leading traders to lift the outlook for Federal Reserve interest-rate reductions next year.】

item.title: 芝加哥学校董事会将考虑罢免学区首席执行官
item.description: 芝加哥教育委员会将考虑解雇学校系统的最高负责人，该负责人在与教师工会的争议性谈判中与市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）发生了冲突。【原文：The Chicago Board of Education will consider firing the school system’s top executive who has clashed with Mayor Brandon Johnson amid contentious negotiations with the teachers’ union.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克称降息反对票受通胀担忧驱动
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）在解释她在本周央行会议上投反对票的原因时说，在通胀降温取得更大进展之前，利率应保持稳定。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack, in explaining her dissenting vote at this week’s central bank meeting, said interest rates should be held steady until there’s more progress in cooling inflation.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称贸易战将极其糟糕：电讯报
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，美国新关税引发的贸易战将严重拖累经济扩张，最终结果无法预测。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said a trade war triggered by new US tariffs would significantly weigh on economic expansion, with the final outcome impossible to predict.】

item.title: 特拉菲古拉和贡渥集团权衡特朗普对 2025 年石油过剩的威胁
item.description: 全球最大的两位石油交易商预计明年市场将供过于求，但他们都认为唐纳德-特朗普可能会改变一切。【原文：Two of the world’s biggest oil traders are expecting the market to be oversupplied next year — but both agree that Donald Trump might just change everything.】

item.title: 立陶宛称 DHL 飞机失事黑匣子显示无舞弊行为
item.description: 立陶宛司法部称，11 月在维尔纽斯机场附近坠毁的 DHL 运营的飞机的飞行记录仪的初步调查结果没有显示出 "非法干扰 "的迹象。【原文：Initial findings from the flight recorders of a DHL-operated plane that crashed near Vilnius Airport in November have given no indication of “illegal interference”, according to the Lithuanian Justice Ministry.】

item.title: 美联储青睐的通胀指标降温至 5 月以来最慢速度
item.description: 美联储首选的基本通胀指标在 11 月份表现平淡，这对希望在 2025 年进一步降息的决策者来说是正确的一步。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s preferred measure of underlying inflation was muted in November, a step in the right direction for policymakers looking to cut interest rates further in 2025.】

item.title: 加拿大零售销售额连月攀升后持平下滑
item.description: 在连续四个月的强劲增长之后，加拿大购物者在 11 月份结束了消费狂潮。【原文：Canadian shoppers ended their spending spree in November after a four-month streak of strong gains.】

item.title: 诺和诺德试验失败提升减肥优势，礼来公司股价上涨
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：Eli Lilly & Co. shares gained as its main rival in weight-loss drugs posted disappointing results from a clinical trial.】

item.title: 诺和诺德因令人失望的药物数据而下跌，丹麦克朗下滑
item.description: 在国家冠军诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）令人失望的临床结果引发对北欧国家经济潜在影响的担忧之后，丹麦克朗下滑。【原文：The Danish krone slipped after disappointing clinical results from national champion Novo Nordisk A/S sparked worries of a potential impact on the Nordic country’s economy.】

item.title: 回购基准下跌，美联储调整旨在抑制波动性
item.description: 与美国隔夜融资相关的主要基准下跌，反映出美联储本周对其用于帮助控制借贷成本和保持这些融资市场平稳运行的工具进行了调整。【原文：Key benchmarks tied to US overnight funding fell, reflecting the Federal Reserve’s adjustment this week to the tools it uses to help control borrowing costs and keep these funding markets running smoothly.】

item.title: 瑞士同意欧盟协议，在 2021 年关系破裂后重建关系
item.description: 经过漫长而紧张的谈判，瑞士和欧盟就确保该国进入欧盟单一市场的协议达成了一致，并在年底的非正式截止日期前完成了谈判。【原文：Switzerland and the European Union agreed on a deal to ensure the country’s access to the bloc’s single market, hitting an unofficial end-of-year deadline after lengthy and intense talks.】

item.title: 莫迪访问科威特旨在促进贸易和防务关系
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）将于周六访问海湾国家科威特，印度和科威特将寻求加强贸易、国防和能源方面的联系，这是印度领导人四十多年来首次访问科威特。【原文：India and Kuwait will look to strengthen ties in trade, defense and energy when Prime Minister Narendra Modi visits the Gulf nation on Saturday, the first by an Indian leader in more than four decades.】

item.title: 波利的保险公司从贷款给他的公司中获得收益和疑虑
item.description: 私募股权公司已经迷上了保险及其为信贷下注提供的稳定资金。Todd Boehly 与安全福利人寿保险公司（Security Benefit Life Insurance Co.【原文：Private equity firms have become enamored with insurance and the stable money it provides for credit bets. Todd Boehly is taking it a step further with Security Benefit Life Insurance Co.】

item.title: 财运下滑，巴西富豪感叹政治功能失调
item.description: 本周，巴西最富有人群的财富缩水超过 120 亿美元，市场大跌使巴西货币跌至历史新低，并拖累一些公司今年的估值下降超过 60%。【原文：A more than $12 billion wipeout in the fortunes of Brazil’s wealthiest people deepened this week, as a market selloff knocked the currency down to a record low and dragged down some company valuations by more than 60% for the year.】

item.title: 美联储戴利称她对 2025 年两次降息 "非常放心
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，她对决策者明年两次降息的预测中值 "非常满意"，并强调央行可以转向更缓慢的方式。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said she is “very comfortable” with policymakers’ median projection of two interest-rate cuts next year, emphasizing the central bank can turn to a slower approach.】

item.title: 巴西央行烧掉 170 亿美元储备以提升雷亚尔汇率
item.description: 本周末，巴西市场出现反弹，原因是央行采取了非同寻常的举措来抑制蔓延全国市场的货币抛售。【原文：Brazilian markets bounced at the end of the week amid extraordinary central bank moves to curb a selloff in the currency that was spreading across the nation’s markets.】

item.title: 双繁荣与双萧条令价值 10 万亿美元的 ETF 行业陷入困境
item.description: 10.4 万亿美元的美国交易所交易基金业在今年取得了巨大成功，但同时也出现了一个问题：即使在创纪录的资金流入和发行情况下，基金也在以前所未有的速度关闭。【原文：The $10.4 trillion US exchange-traded fund industry’s blockbuster year comes with an asterisk: even amid record inflows and launches, funds are shuttering at a nearly unprecedented clip.】

item.title: 激进分子布朗宁-韦斯特持有 CAE 4% 的股份，以影响首席执行官的继任
item.description: 投资公司 Browning West LP 已持有总部位于魁北克的飞行模拟器公司 CAE Inc. 4.3% 的股份，并希望在挑选下一任首席执行官时拥有发言权。【原文：Investment firm Browning West LP has built a 4.3% interest in Quebec-based flight simulator company CAE Inc. and wants a say in picking its next chief executive officer.】

item.title: 加纳因天气原因下调 2024-25 年可可收成预测
item.description: 加纳第二次下调了从 9 月份开始的可可收获季节的收成预测，这是世界第二大可可种植国最近一次供应受挫，有可能进一步助长价格上涨，对巧克力商和消费者都造成打击。【原文：Ghana cut its cocoa harvest forecast a second time for the season that started September, the latest supply setback in the world’s second-largest grower that risks further fueling a price rally that has hit both chocolatiers and consumers.】

item.title: 特朗普要求欧盟购买更多美国石油和天然气，但这一要求很难得到回应
item.description:
扩大采购面临诸多实际限制，尤其是该国的供应量有限。【原文：

Ramping up purchases faces numerous practical constraints, not least the country’s limited supply.

】

item.title: 炼油业受挫，俄罗斯燃料出口将逐年下降
item.description: 在俄罗斯炼油厂缩减加工规模、莫斯科下令优先发展国内市场之后，俄罗斯今年的海运燃料出口量将大幅下降。【原文：Russia’s seaborne fuel exports are set to fall sharply this year after the country’s oil refineries scaled back processing and Moscow ordered them to prioritize the domestic market.】
